solution_line_template: First find the total number of items in the attic by dividing the number of useful items by the percentage of useful items: {useful_items_count} items / {useful_items_percent_decimal} = <<{useful_items_count}/{useful_items_percent_decimal}={total_items}>>{total_items} items

Then multiply the total number of items by the percentage that are junk to find the number of junk items: {total_items} items * {junk_items_percent_decimal} = <<{total_items}*{junk_items_percent_decimal}={junk_items_count}>>{junk_items_count} items
